description: This file defines a custom Document class for Next.js, customizing the HTML structure and initial props for server-side rendering in a hybrid app setup.

classes.name: MyDocument
classes.description: Custom Next.js Document extending the base Document to customize server-side rendering HTML structure.

methods.name: getInitialProps
methods.description: Fetches initial document props for server-side rendering.

methods.name: render
methods.description: Returns the custom HTML structure for SSR pages.
